[data-ref=taskCountField] input.title: 50 tasks
[data-ref=taskCountField] input.content: Amount of tasks to generate, but you can enter another number here and press [ENTER] to generate more.

[data-ref=projectSizeField] input.title: Every 10 have dependencies between them
[data-ref=projectSizeField] input.content: Number of tasks to connect with dependencies. Change value and press [ENTER] to modify.

[data-ref=exportButton].title: Click to export
[data-ref=exportButton].content: Opens a dialog to customize export
